archdesc.bioghist: Political action committee of Michigan's gay-lesbian-bisexual-transgender community. The organization was established in 1985 as the Michigan Human Rights Campaign Committee, an offshoot of the Michigan Organization for Human Rights political action committee. The name was changed to Pride PAC in 1995.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes, election guides, mailings, and related materials.
